schema.name: Healthyfied Tofu Sisig with Egg

recipeInstructions.text: Start by dicing the red onion, red bell pepper, and leeks. Mince the garlic and chop the fresh green chilli.
In a non-stick skillet, crumble the firm tofu and cook over medium-high heat for about 5 minutes until browned. Set aside.
Using the same skillet, add a bit of coconut oil and sauté garlic, onion, bell pepper, green chilli, and leeks until softened, about 5-7 minutes.
Return the tofu to the skillet. Add coconut amino, salt, and pepper. Stir well to combine all ingredients. Reduce heat to medium and let it cook for an additional 5 minutes.
In a separate pan, fry the eggs to your liking.
Serve the tofu sisig hot, topped with a fried egg on each serving. Enjoy your healthy meal!

schema.description: This Healthyfied Tofu Sisig with Egg recipe is perfect for anyone looking to enjoy a classic Filipino dish with a healthy twist. Low-carb and low-sugar, it's a guilt-free option that doesn't compromise on flavor. Dive into this blend of fragrant spices, fresh veggies, and hearty tofu for a satisfying meal.
